ðŸ“– Summary: Typesense is a fast, typo-tolerant search engine designed as an open-source alternative to Algolia and a more user-friendly alternative to Elasticsearch. It's built in C++ and architected for low-latency instant searches. Key features include typo tolerance, simple setup and operation, blazing fast speed, tunable ranking, and sorting capabilities.
